price: N’iyo zababonaga, zaravugaga ziti “Mu by’ukuri bariya barayobye.”
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
